tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE competitor_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    revenue DECIMAL(10, 2),
    market_share DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE CompetitorData ( 
 competitor_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 competitor_name VARCHAR(50), 
 revenue DECIMAL(10, 2), 
 market_share DECIMAL(5, 2), 
 product_sold INT 
);

CREATE TABLE ProductOpportunities ( 
 opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 opportunity_name VARCHAR(50), 
 opportunity_description TEXT, 
 target_market VARCHAR(50), 
 estimated_profit DECIMAL(10, 2) 
);

CREATE TABLE competitors (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    market_segment VARCHAR(255),
    revenue DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE market_research (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    study_date DATE,
    study_location VARCHAR(255),
    study_topic VARCHAR(255),
    researcher_name VARCHAR(255),
    findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE product_opportunities (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    target_market VARCHAR(255),
    competitive_advantage TEXT,
    opportunity_identified BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE positioning_strategies (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    target_market VARCHAR(255),
    marketing_channels TEXT[],
    success_metrics VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE MarketResearch (
    research_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    competitor_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    market_trend VARCHAR(100),
    market_share DECIMAL
);
